api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.title: Enum GovernmentBondNominalRating | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.summary: Enum GovernmentBondNominalRating Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Enums Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Represents the nominal credit rating buckets used by the ECB when publishing government bond yield data. public enum GovernmentBondNominalRating Fields AAA = 0 AAA-rated government bonds. AAAtoAA = 2 AAA to AA rating bucket. AllRatings = 1 All available ratings.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.title: Enum MaturityFrequency | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.summary: Enum MaturityFrequency Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Enums Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Specifies how maturities are selected when constructing or retrieving yield curves. public enum MaturityFrequency Fields Monthly = 1 Use monthly maturities (includes shorter-term monthly points, e.g. 3 months, 6 months, and monthly up to the maximum term). Yearly = 0 Use yearly maturities only (e.g. 1 year, 2 years, ...).

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.summary: Enum NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameter Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Enums Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll public enum NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameter Fields Beta0 = 0 Beta1 = 1 Beta2 = 2 Beta3 = 3 Tau1 = 4 Tau2 = 5

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.title: Enum QuoteType | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.En.summary: Enum QuoteType Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Enums Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Specifies the type of quote used when observing or constructing a yield curve. public enum QuoteType Fields InstantaneousForwardRate = 0 Instantaneous forward rate (short-term forward rate derived from the yield curve). ParRate = 1 Par rate (coupon rate for which the bond trades at par given the yield curve). SpotRate = 2 Spot rate (zero-coupon yield for the given maturity).

MaturityFrequency Specifies how maturities are selected when constructing or retrieving yield curves. NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameter QuoteType Specifies the type of quote used when observing or constructing a yield curve.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.title: Interface IYieldCurveLoader | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.summary: Interface IYieldCurveLoader Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Defines methods to asynchronously load yield curve data. Implementations retrieve yield curves based on government bond ratings, quote types, dates, and maturity frequencies. public interface IYieldCurveLoader Methods GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime, MaturityFrequency) Asynchronously gets a single yield curve for a specified government bond nominal rating, quote type, date, and maturity frequency. Task<YieldCurve> GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime date, MaturityFrequency maturityFrequency) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The government bond nominal rating for which to retrieve the yield curve. quoteType QuoteType The type of yield curve quote. date DateTime The date for which to retrieve the yield curve. maturityFrequency MaturityFrequency The frequency of maturities on the yield curve. Returns Task<YieldCurve> A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved YieldCurve. GetYieldCurvesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime, DateTime, MaturityFrequency) Asynchronously gets a collection of yield curves for a specified government bond nominal rating, quote type, date range, and maturity frequency. Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurve>> GetYieldCurvesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, MaturityFrequency maturityFrequency) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The government bond nominal rating for which to retrieve the yield curves. quoteType QuoteType The type of yield curve quote. startDate DateTime The start date of the date range for which to retrieve yield curves. endDate DateTime The end date of the date range for which to retrieve yield curves. maturityFrequency MaturityFrequency The frequency of maturities on the yield curves. Returns Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurve>> A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a collection of retrieved YieldCurve instances.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.title: Interface IYieldCurveParameterLoader | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.summary: Interface IYieldCurveParameterLoader Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Defines methods for loading Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) model parameters for government bond yield curves. Implementations are responsible for retrieving parameter sets for specified ratings and optional date ranges. public interface IYieldCurveParameterLoader Methods GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating) Asynchronously retrieves NSS parameters for the specified government bond nominal rating across all available dates. Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of government bonds to retrieve parameters for. Returns Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> A task that resolves to a collection of NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters instances. GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, DateTime, DateTime) Asynchronously retrieves NSS parameters for the specified government bond nominal rating within the inclusive date range defined by startDate and endDate. Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of government bonds to retrieve parameters for. startDate DateTime Inclusive start date of the range to retrieve parameters for. endDate DateTime Inclusive end date of the range to retrieve parameters for. Returns Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> A task that resolves to a collection of NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters instances within the requested date range.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.title: Interface IYieldCurveQuoteLoader | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.summary: Interface IYieldCurveQuoteLoader Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Defines methods to asynchronously load yield curve quotes over time for a specified GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, and Maturity. public interface IYieldCurveQuoteLoader Methods GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, Maturity) Asynchronously retrieves yield curve quotes for the specified government bond nominal rating, quote type and maturity across all available dates. Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, Maturity maturity) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of the government bonds to load quotes for. quoteType QuoteType The type of quote to retrieve (for example, spot rate, par rate or instantaneous forward rate). maturity Maturity The maturity for which to retrieve quotes. Returns Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> A task that resolves to a collection of YieldCurveQuote instances for the requested maturity across available dates. GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, Maturity, DateTime, DateTime) Asynchronously retrieves yield curve quotes for the specified government bond nominal rating, quote type and maturity within the inclusive date range defined by startDate and endDate. Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, Maturity maturity, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of the government bonds to load quotes for. quoteType QuoteType The type of quote to retrieve. maturity Maturity The maturity for which to retrieve quotes. startDate DateTime Inclusive start date of the range to retrieve quotes for. endDate DateTime Inclusive end date of the range to retrieve quotes for. Returns Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>> A task that resolves to a collection of YieldCurveQuote instances within the requested date range.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.summary: Class YieldCurveLoader Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Loads yield curves by retrieving yield curve quotes and parameters, and constructing YieldCurve instances. public class YieldCurveLoader : IYieldCurveLoader Inheritance object YieldCurveLoader Implements IYieldCurveLoader Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors YieldCurveLoader() Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurveLoader class with default implementations of the quote and parameter loaders, which are YieldCurveQuoteLoader and YieldCurveParameterLoader respectively. public YieldCurveLoader() YieldCurveLoader(IYieldCurveQuoteLoader, IYieldCurveParameterLoader) Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurveLoader class with the specified quote loader and parameter loader. public YieldCurveLoader(IYieldCurveQuoteLoader yieldCurveQuoteLoader, IYieldCurveParameterLoader yieldCurveParameterLoader) Parameters yieldCurveQuoteLoader IYieldCurveQuoteLoader The loader responsible for retrieving yield curve quotes. yieldCurveParameterLoader IYieldCurveParameterLoader The loader responsible for retrieving Nelson-Siegel-Svensson parameters. Methods GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime, MaturityFrequency) Asynchronously gets a single yield curve for a specified government bond nominal rating, quote type, date, and maturity frequency. public Task<YieldCurve> GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime date, MaturityFrequency maturityFrequency) Parameters governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The government bond nominal rating for which to retrieve the yield curve. quoteType QuoteType The type of yield curve quote. date DateTime The date for which to retrieve the yield curve. maturityFrequency MaturityFrequency The frequency of maturities on the yield curve. Returns Task<YieldCurve> A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved YieldCurve. Returns Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurve>> A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a collection of retrieved YieldCurve instances.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Lo.summary: Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders Classes YieldCurveLoader Loads yield curves by retrieving yield curve quotes and parameters, and constructing YieldCurve instances. YieldCurveParameterLoader Loads Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) parameters for government bond yield curves. YieldCurveQuoteLoader Loads yield curve quotes for a specific GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType and Maturity. Interfaces IYieldCurveLoader Defines methods to asynchronously load yield curve data. Implementations retrieve yield curves based on government bond ratings, quote types, dates, and maturity frequencies. IYieldCurveParameterLoader Defines methods for loading Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) model parameters for government bond yield curves. Implementations are responsible for retrieving parameter sets for specified ratings and optional date ranges. IYieldCurveQuoteLoader Defines methods to asynchronously load yield curve quotes over time for a specified GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, and Maturity.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.title: Class Maturity | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.summary: Class Maturity Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Represents the maturity of a bond expressed in years and months. public record Maturity : IComparable<Maturity>, IEquatable<Maturity> Inheritance object Maturity Implements IComparable<Maturity> IEquatable<Maturity> Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors Maturity(int) Initializes a new instance of the Maturity record with only a year component. The months component is set to zero. public Maturity(int Years) Parameters Years int Maturity(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the Maturity record with the specified number of years and months. public Maturity(int Years, int Months) Parameters Years int Months int Exceptions ArgumentOutOfRangeException Thrown when years is negative, or months is not between 0 and 11. ArgumentException Thrown when both years and months are zero, as a maturity of zero is not valid in a yield curve context. Properties Months Gets the number of additional months (0–11) in the maturity period. public int Months { get; } Property Value int Years Gets the number of whole years in the maturity period. public int Years { get; } Property Value int Methods CompareTo(Maturity?) Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object. public int CompareTo(Maturity? other) Parameters other Maturity An object to compare with this instance. Returns int A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes other in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as other. Greater than zero This instance follows other in the sort order. ToString() Returns a string representation of the maturity, using the format "{n}Y{m}M". For example: "5Y6M", "2Y", or "3M". public override string ToString() Returns string A string describing the maturity in years and months.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.title: Class NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.summary: Class NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Parameters for the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) yield curve model. The NSS model uses a combination of level, slope and two curvature components to fit observed yields across maturities. public record NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters : IEquatable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters> Inheritance object NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters Implements IEquatable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters> Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters(DateTime, GovernmentBondNominalRating, double, double, double, double, double, double) Parameters for the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) yield curve model. The NSS model uses a combination of level, slope and two curvature components to fit observed yields across maturities. public NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters(DateTime Date, GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating, double Beta0, double Beta1, double Beta2, double Beta3, double Tau1, double Tau2) Parameters Date DateTime The date for which the parameters were estimated or observed. GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of the government bond these parameters apply to. Beta0 double Long-term level of the yield curve (as maturity → ∞). Beta1 double Short-term component; controls the initial slope of the yield curve. Beta2 double Medium-term curvature; introduces a hump or dip at intermediate maturities. Beta3 double Additional long-term curvature to capture more complex shapes at longer maturities. Tau1 double Decay factor for Beta1 and Beta2; determines how quickly their effects diminish with maturity (expressed in years). Tau2 double Decay factor for Beta3; controls the influence of the second curvature term over time (expressed in years). Properties Beta0 Long-term level of the yield curve (as maturity → ∞). public double Beta0 { get; init; } Property Value double Beta1 Short-term component; controls the initial slope of the yield curve. public double Beta1 { get; init; } Property Value double Beta2 Medium-term curvature; introduces a hump or dip at intermediate maturities. public double Beta2 { get; init; } Property Value double Beta3 Additional long-term curvature to capture more complex shapes at longer maturities. public double Beta3 { get; init; } Property Value double Date The date for which the parameters were estimated or observed. public DateTime Date { get; init; } Property Value DateTime GovernmentBondNominalRating The nominal rating of the government bond these parameters apply to. public GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating { get; init; } Property Value GovernmentBondNominalRating Tau1 Decay factor for Beta1 and Beta2; determines how quickly their effects diminish with maturity (expressed in years). public double Tau1 { get; init; } Property Value double Tau2 Decay factor for Beta3; controls the influence of the second curvature term over time (expressed in years). public double Tau2 { get; init; } Property Value double

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.title: Class YieldCurve | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.summary: Class YieldCurve Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Represents a yield curve composed of a collection of YieldCurveQuote items. The curve provides access to the underlying quotes, an indexer for retrieving yields by Maturity, and optional fitted NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters describing the curve shape. public class YieldCurve : IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>, IEnumerable Inheritance object YieldCurve Implements IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> IEnumerable Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors YieldCurve(IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote>, NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters?, GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime) Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurve class. public YieldCurve(IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> quotes, NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters? nelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters, GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime date) Parameters quotes IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> The collection of yield curve quotes. nelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters The NSS parameters fitted to the curve, if any. governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating The government bond nominal rating for the curve. quoteType QuoteType The type of quote represented in the curve. date DateTime The date the curve is valid for. Properties Date The date the yield curve is valid for. public DateTime Date { get; } Property Value DateTime GovernmentBondNominalRating The government bond nominal rating associated with this yield curve. public GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating { get; } Property Value GovernmentBondNominalRating this[Maturity] Gets the yield for the specified maturity. public double this[Maturity maturity] { get; } Parameters maturity Maturity The maturity for which to retrieve the yield. Property Value double The yield corresponding to the specified maturity. Exceptions KeyNotFoundException Thrown if the maturity is not present in the curve. Maturities The maturities available on the yield curve. public IEnumerable<Maturity> Maturities { get; } Property Value IEnumerable<Maturity> NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters The parameters of the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson model fitted to this curve, if available. public NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters? NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters { get; } Property Value NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters QuoteType The type of quote (e.g. spot rate, par rate) represented by the curve. public QuoteType QuoteType { get; } Property Value QuoteType Quotes The collection of quotes that make up this yield curve. public IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> Quotes { get; } Property Value IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> Yields The yields corresponding to the maturities in the curve, in the same order as Maturities. public IEnumerable<double> Yields { get; } Property Value IEnumerable<double> Methods GetEnumerator() Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection. public IEnumerator<YieldCurveQuote> GetEnumerator() Returns IEnumerator<YieldCurveQuote> An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.title: Class YieldCurveQuote | ECBFinanceAPI
api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.summary: Class YieldCurveQuote Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models Assembly ECBFinanceAPI.dll Immutable record representing a single quote on a yield curve. public record YieldCurveQuote : IEquatable<YieldCurveQuote> Inheritance object YieldCurveQuote Implements IEquatable<YieldCurveQuote> Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Remarks Instances of this record represent a single point on a yield curve; a collection of these for the same date but different maturities forms a full yield curve observation. Constructors YieldCurveQuote(DateTime, Maturity, double) Immutable record representing a single quote on a yield curve. public YieldCurveQuote(DateTime Date, Maturity Maturity, double Yield) Parameters Date DateTime The date the quote was observed. Maturity Maturity The Maturity that identifies the term associated with this quote. Yield double The yield value for the specified maturity (expressed as a decimal, e.g. 0.05 for 5%). Remarks Instances of this record represent a single point on a yield curve; a collection of these for the same date but different maturities forms a full yield curve observation. Properties Date The date the quote was observed. public DateTime Date { get; init; } Property Value DateTime Maturity The Maturity that identifies the term associated with this quote. public Maturity Maturity { get; init; } Property Value Maturity Yield The yield value for the specified maturity (expressed as a decimal, e.g. 0.05 for 5%). public double Yield { get; init; } Property Value double

api/ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Mo.summary: Namespace ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models Classes Maturity Represents the maturity of a bond expressed in years and months. NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters Parameters for the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) yield curve model. The NSS model uses a combination of level, slope and two curvature components to fit observed yields across maturities. YieldCurve Represents a yield curve composed of a collection of YieldCurveQuote items. getting_started/getting-started.html.title: Getting started | ECBFinanceAPI
getting_started/getting-started.html.summary: Getting started The library is based around loaders, that loads collections of models given the data specifications. Whenever you want to access some data, you instantiate a loader and call it with your data specifications, and that will return a collection of the model associated with that call. Let's say we want to load all the available 10-year spot rates for AAA rated governmet bonds in the euro area. var quoteLoader = new YieldCurveQuoteLoader(); var rating = GovernmentBondNominalRating.AAA; var quoteType = QuoteType.SpotRate; var maturity = new Maturity(Years: 10); IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> tenYearAAASpotRates = await quoteLoader.GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(rating, quoteType, maturity); We can also specify the time inverval: var startDate = new DateTime(2025, 01, 01); var endDate = new DateTime(2025, 12, 31); IEnumerable<YieldCurveQuote> tenYearAAASpotRatesOf2025 = await quoteLoader.GetYieldCurveQuotesAsync(rating, quoteType, maturity, startDate, endDate); The YieldCurveQuote model is a simple data container, but some loaders will return more sophisticated models: var yieldCurveLoader = new YieldCurveLoader(); var date = new DateTime(2025, 01, 31); var maturityFrequency = MaturityFrequency.Yearly; YieldCurve curve = await yieldCurveLoader.GetYieldCurveAsync(rating, quoteType, date, maturityFrequency);

index.html.summary: This is the HOMEPAGE. Refer to Markdown for how to write markdown files. Quick Start Notes: Add images to the images folder if the file is referencing an image.

release_notes/release-notes.html.title: Release Notes | ECBFinanceAPI
release_notes/release-notes.html.summary: Release Notes Version 1.0.0 Features Added a feature to load yield curve quotes through YieldCurveQuoteLoader. Added a feature to load Nelson-Siegel-Svensson parameters through YieldCurveParameterLoader. Added a feature to load yield curves through YieldCurveLoader.
